issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5. Description

When building an app to an iOS simulator the user is prompted to select a simulator. The text for the prompt is 'Select an simulator by number or name'.

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build an app to iOS simulator with ios.autoSelectDevice set to false

h5.Actual Result

The prompt has the above text

h5.Expected Result

The prompt should have the text 'Select a simulator by number or name'
fields.summary: CLI: Prompting for choosing an iOS simulator is grammatically incorrect
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.5
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409261245
Titanium SDK build: 3.4.1.v20141007092513
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.0
Alloy: 1.5.1
Xcode: 6.1 GM Seed

comments.body: This is right up there with "Select an device by number or name".
